channel.title: New Rsc server ManchPK
channel.description:
New server my buddies and I are working on for pking. Just level up, pk, and have some fun guys
~ManchPK Features~
-24/7 pk server thats always improving -Friendly staff -Dragon maze with rune dropping dragons and lessers -Kbd that drops dragon items -Working Masterfisher -Working Adventurer -Daily events -Herblaw quest -Unique bosses and Items(General Khazard drops best item in game which is better than d baxe) -All skills working -Added bows and arrows at lowe -100 people max so nothing is overcrowded -Added more adventurer locations
http://rapidshare.com/files/232313940/Distributed_Client.rar
No forums in post.

[/quote]
That’s the last thing I’m worried about. Lol.[/quote]lmfao true wont last long if u have 10-15 players they will get bored and quit happen to me

item.title: New Rsc server ManchPK
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“Powerslave, post:1, topic:280887”][quote author=Jessekinss link=topic=367303.msg2802896#msg2802896 date=1243546688]

You don’t get the point- the name doesn’t affect a server’s popularity…

Apparently not, seeing as you ONLY have 15 members, and the server has been out for how long? Almost 3 weeks?
[/quote]

First of all, this isn’t MY server.

Second, this server isn’t unpopular because of the username. Its unpopularity is due to other factors (unoriginal server design, hosted off of someone’s PC, EasyRSC source, etc.)[/quote]
You’re defending it, you made me assume it was yours. And why are you so quick to reject ownership? It’s not yours but you made it pretty clear, pretty fast that it wasn’t. I’m guessing you don’t play it, or have any affiliation with it. Mind telling me why?

Where did I say it was ONLY the name that kept the server from being popular? I’m just stating facts that most people wont play a server with a shitty name, and trust me I went through it with RSCPK, so don’t tell me different.

Read full topic

It’s called “ManchPK”… How popular do you expect it to get? Lol.
[/quote]

The name doesn’t have anything to do with popularity. The server could be called “FaggotPK” and still have a decent amount of players.[/quote]
Then why don’t you? 15 players isn’t “decent”.

item.title: New Rsc server ManchPK
item.dc:creator: @playerAction playerAction
item.description:
@playerAction wrote:

[quote=“Jakev123, post:32, topic:278304”][quote author=playerAction link=topic=367303.msg2785050#msg2785050 date=1242442252]

good server, just needs a couple more players to kick this off

easyrsc is pretty good idk why people dont like it

EasyRSC is good, but not as good as RSCD v25
[/quote]

meh i havent played rscd v25 in a long time… but i sorta like easyrsc is the coder does good updates on it often and the staff is good[/quote]

EasyRSC and RSCD v25 are almost the same. The only difference is that RSCD v25 has forums linked to the game server.

Edit: EasyRSC also has a control panel that makes it easy to edit people’s stats, change XP rate, server settings, etc.

Read full topic
